reviews.review_msg: Lots of group work that seemed aimless, with very little actual instruction on the course topics. Criteria varied considerably between the prof and the TM, which made constructive feedback hard to find.

As others have noted, she does seem to have good intentions and is excited about teaching, but sadly, she is very very bad at it. Lots of useless group work. Lots of small assignments and "field projects" that require work and dont really have a point. Large assignment ok but lectures are painful!!!
Good professor!  Cares about what she teaches.  She encourages participation and teaches critical thinking.
